title: Turned over a new leaf. What did I find?
body: Many of the long term forum goers of GD/Boards know me as a nice young girl who isn't rude to people and I stand for what is right! This is getting me nowhere and people [ I wont name and shame (sartorious) ] Are just genuinely very rude to me. I cant handle the abuse I get from certain individuals. I've started to be rude and mean myself and I've gotten many nice things in return :)

replies.body: ....you were a guy in the photos you posted...
the fedora picture which you can find online?

wasnt it you posing the pic of a dude dressed as cait standing the same way she does....guess not...

still, you are a %%%% %%%%.
Umm I remember you being a rude joking girl always arguing with molendo and trying to prove a point :P
And molendo was always wrong anyway. He never deserved to be welcome onto boards after the excessive trolling he did on GD.

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wY3yBWOA,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-03-08T05:24:20.801+0000)
>
> And molendo was always wrong anyway. He never deserved to be welcome onto boards after the excessive trolling he did on GD.

lol touch√©
See no one tells me (Or trolls) if someone is a guy or a girl in GD so I assume everyone is a guy. Honestly idk if you're lying or not but I'll assume you're a guy for now.
thats fine. Gender isnt important anyway :)

lol I didn't see you on the old forums so theres a rather large chance ive been on here longer than you.
although I think you should go back to your crib if you are just going to cry like a baby because someone new doesn't bow down to you

excuse me? I don't expect people to bow down to me just because I am a Goddess. Just like any other God people have a choice to worship me or not. Being rude to me isn't needed when I am just a nice young girl looking for friends ):
well idk about the OP but molendo was probably worlds greatest %%%%%%.
all i ever get is abuse zzzzz
